sect2.title: Reinstallation of shadow to utilize PAM
sect2.para: Reinstall shadow by running the following commands:

screen.userinput: LDFLAGS="-lpam -lpam_misc" ./configure --prefix=/usr --enable-shared --with-libpam && make && make install && rm /bin/vipw && rm /bin/sg && mv /lib/{libmisc.*a,libshadow.*a} /usr/lib && cp debian/securetty /etc/securetty
